title: Telecommunications Engineer
description:
As an Assistant Telecommunications Engineer you will be responsible for assisting development of telecommunications designs to support Network Rail GRIP Stage 3 through to GRIP Stage 8 projects and also assist in production of RIBA stage E through K reports, calculations, and drawings to enable the principal contractors to successfully build specific projects.


The right candidate should have knowledge in Network Rail and London Underground Infrastructure Projects.

  



Qualifications


The candidate must demonstrate the qualifications and experience/capability described below:

* Master of Science / Engineering in an electronic communications course of study.
* Bachelor of Science in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
* Must be pursuing professional qualification in a relevant engineering discipline (MIET, etc.).
* Experience, preferably in the UK, assisting in production and checking of Telecommunications designs
* Underpinning knowledge of Network design principles and significant experience working within a rail environment and good working knowledge of Network Rail, TfL & LUL standards, IET Regulations.
* As an Assistant telecommunications engineer you will need to have the knowledge on the working principles in the design of various systems and subsystems, these will include but not limited to.
	
		- Trackside equipment and infrastructure installation and operation
		- Fixed Telecommunications Network (FTN and FTNx)
		- Radio systems in UK Rail operations (GSM-R primarily)
		- Station and Building network infrastructure –Structured Cabling infrastructure – Copper and fibre optic
		- Multiprotocol Label Switching Networks (MPLS) and SD-WAN
		- Internet Protocol Closed Circuit Television (IP-CCTV) Systems
		- EN54 Public Address and Voice Alarm Systems
		- Integrated Station / Building Management Systems (SMS, IBMS)
		- Customer Information Systems (CIS)
		- IP based Access Control Systems
		- Multi-mode Intruder Detection Systems
		- Wireless Network Architecture
		- Voice Over Internet Protocol (VOIP) including:
		- Video Intercom Systems
		- Passenger Help Points
		- Telephony
		- Experience in the preparation of conceptual reports, telecommunications scheme designs, project documentation, specifications, contract schedules, implementation/ construction plans and costings to client requirements.
		- Previous experience in developing, analysing, assessing and implementation of Network Bandwidth allocation for MPLS converged networks
		- Provision of specialist technical support and assistance to railway projects, and management of allocated junior support staff.
		- Required Office Software:
		- MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio and Outlook
		- At least one of the following:
		- Bentley Micro station
		- Autodesk AutoCAD
		- Knowledge of railway Telecommunications systems, both Operational and Station Information and Surveillance Systems SISS (and the key interactions between other railway assets), and with railway operating practices.
		- Working knowledge of interfacing and coordination with other rail systems disciplines.
		- Broad knowledge of rail systems construction methods.
		- Familiarity with health & safety and systems engineering/design assurance requirements.
		- Stimulated by meeting technical challenges
- Technical ability and innovative mind set
- Focus on quality and drive for continuous improvement
- Good communication and organisation skills
- Skills as part of a team
- Active in self-development
- Accountability

title: Caller
company: UNI ARK STUDY ABROAD PVT LTD.
description:
**About Company :**

***UNI ARK STUDY ABROAD PVT LTD***, headquartered in Kochi, Kerala have 5 branches , stands as a distinguished entity set to embark on a strategic expansion initiative through the establishment of a new branch in Trivandrum, Kerala. Our corporate ethos is steeped in professionalism, agility, and innovation, positioning us as a preeminent INTERNATIONAL EDUCATION SPECIALIST. UNI ARK has earned an esteemed reputation for delivering universally trusted and respected guidance in the realm of higher education. Emerging as a prominent force in the sector, UNI ARK represents a pinnacle of diverse expertise and linguistic finesse, distinguishing itself among the foremost higher education consultancies in India. The company's unparalleled proficiency and enduring presence have garnered swift recognition from discerning observers.

*Our Distinctive Work Environment Encompasses:*

* **Modern Office Setting:**
* Our state-of-the-art office spaces provide a contemporary and conducive environment, fostering a culture of innovation and efficiency.
* **Growth Opportunities:**
* UNI ARK is committed to nurturing the professional growth of its team members, offering avenues for career advancement within the organization.
* **Student Counseling for Overseas Education:**
* Engage in meaningful interactions with students, providing expert guidance on pursuing higher education abroad, aligning their aspirations with global academic opportunities.
* **Student Follow-up:**
* Implement effective follow-up strategies to ensure seamless communication with students, addressing their concerns and facilitating a smooth transition through the application process.
* **Query Resolution and Registration Handling:**
* Demonstrate adeptness in resolving student queries with precision and professionalism, while also managing the intricacies of the registration process.
* **Comprehensive Student Assistance:**
* Act as a guiding force for students, offering assistance from university application stages through to the intricacies of the visa application process.

**Objective:**

To ensure a professional and efficient front desk operation, providing excellent telephonic communication and customer service to enhance the overall experience for clients and visitors.

**Responsibilities:**

**1. Front Desk Operations:**

- Greet and welcome visitors in a courteous and professional manner.

- Manage incoming calls, promptly directing them to the appropriate department or individual.

- Maintain a tidy and organized reception area, creating a positive first impression for guests.

2. **Telephonic Communication:**

- Answer, screen, and forward incoming calls efficiently, ensuring a high standard of customer service.

- Provide information to callers, take messages, and transfer calls to appropriate personnel.

- Handle inquiries with professionalism, addressing customer needs and concerns.

3. **Appointment Scheduling:**

- Schedule appointments for clients or visitors with relevant staff members.

- Coordinate and confirm appointments to ensure optimal utilization of time.

4. **Administrative Support:**

- Assist with administrative tasks, including sorting and distributing mail, handling courier services, and maintaining office supplies.

- Ensure accurate record-keeping of visitor logs and contact information.

5. **Customer Assistance:**

- Act as the first point of contact for clients and visitors, offering assistance and guidance as needed.

- Provide basic information about the organization and its services.

6. **Communication Liaison:**

- Serve as a communication link between various departments, relaying messages and ensuring effective internal communication.

7. **Technology Proficiency:**

- Utilize office equipment such as telephone systems, fax machines, and computer systems proficiently.

- Ensure the efficient operation of telecommunication systems.

8. **Problem Resolution:**

- Address and resolve customer inquiries or complaints promptly and professionally.

- Escalate complex issues to the appropriate department for further resolution.

9. **Multitasking:**

- Handle multiple tasks simultaneously, including managing phone lines, welcoming visitors, and providing administrative support.

10. **Adherence to Protocols:**

- Follow established protocols for security, privacy, and confidentiality.

- Implement and maintain reception procedures to ensure a smooth workflow.

**Qualifications and Skills:**

- Excellent verbal communication skills.

- Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.

- Proficiency in using office equipment and computer systems.

- Pleasant and professional demeanor.

- Customer service orientation.

- Previous experience in a receptionist/tele caller role is preferred.

By effectively fulfilling these responsibilities, the Receptionist/Tele caller plays a crucial role in creating a positive and welcoming atmosphere for clients, visitors, and staff members.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresher

Salary: ₹12,000.00 - ₹15,000.00 per month

Benefits:

* Cell phone reimbursement
* Paid time off

Schedule:

* Day shift

Supplemental pay types:

* Commission pay
* Performance bonus

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**About us:**

**DIAGNAL** is a technology provider focused on helping customers around the world to build revenue-generating digital media products.

We are video business product specialists and we help our customers build revenue-generating video-streaming products & platforms.

We are seeking highly skilled and experienced MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, ReactJS, Node.js) Stack Developers with a minimum of 4 years of proven professional experience. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing web applications and backend services, particularly in the areas of video streaming and consumer-facing platforms.

Location: Trivandrum, Kerala

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and maintain web applications using the MERN stack for video streaming on various devices.
* Architect and implement features, ensuring high performance and responsiveness of the applications.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
* Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* Implement security and data protection features.
* Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies, sharing insights with the team.
* Participate in the entire application lifecycle – from concept and design to testing, deployment, and support.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum 3 years of professional experience in ReactJs and 2 years in NodeJs.
* Proven expertise in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, AJAX, and JSON.
* Solid experience with ReactJS, demonstrating the development of polished consumer-facing websites.
* Hands-on experience with server-side development using Node.js and Express.js.
* Strong understanding of MongoDB and database integration.
* Experience with front-end libraries, particularly Ant Design (Antd).

**Preferred Skills:**

* Previous experience in large-scale consumer-facing industries such as OTT apps, Media, E-commerce, or Telecommunications.

* Fixed shift
* Monday to Friday

* Yearly bonus

* Node.js: 2 years (Required)

Work Location: In person

Application Deadline: 03/03/2024

title: Technical Specialist
description:
#### **About the job Microsoft Teams Voice Specialist**


***Job Description:***

**Exp. level: 8+ years**


**Duration: 6 Months + extendable**
﻿

As a Microsoft Teams Voice Solution Specialist, you will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and managing voice communication solutions using Microsoft Teams. You will leverage your expertise in unified communications and collaboration to ensure seamless and efficient voice communication within the organization. Your responsibilities will include deploying, configuring, and optimizing Microsoft Teams Voice features, integrating them with existing systems, and providing technical support to ensure a reliable and effective voice communication environment.


**Key Responsibilities:**


* Voice Solution Design: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and design voice communication solutions using Microsoft Teams, considering business needs, scalability, security, and best practices.
* Deployment and Configuration: Lead the deployment and configuration of Microsoft Teams Voice components, including direct routing, calling plans, voice policies, and auto-attendants, to enable high-quality voice calls.
* Integration: Integrate Microsoft Teams Voice with existing telephony systems, ensuring seamless interoperability and minimal disruption to ongoing operations.
* Quality and Performance Optimization: Monitor, analyze, and optimize voice call quality and performance by identifying and addressing network, hardware, and software issues.
* Security and Compliance: Implement security measures and compliance policies to protect voice communication data and ensure adherence to regulatory requirements.
* Technical Support: Provide advanced technical support and troubleshooting for voice communication issues, working closely with internal teams and vendors to resolve incidents promptly.
* User Training and Adoption: Develop training materials and conduct training sessions for end-users to promote the adoption and effective use of Microsoft Teams Voice features.
* Documentation: Maintain accurate documentation of voice solution configurations, processes, and troubleshooting procedures.
* Vendor Management: Collaborate with third-party vendors and service providers to ensure the successful implementation and ongoing support of voice solutions.
* Stay Current: Keep abreast of the latest updates, features, and best practices related to Microsoft Teams Voice and unified communications technologies.


**Qualifications and Skills:**


* Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Telecommunications, or a related field.
* Proven experience in designing, implementing, and managing voice communication solutions, preferably using Microsoft Teams or other unified communication platforms.
* In-depth knowledge of Microsoft Teams Voice features, including direct routing, voice policies, call routing, auto-attendants, and emergency calls.
* Familiarity with session border controllers (SBCs), PSTN connectivity, and SIP trunking for voice solutions.
* Strong understanding of networking concepts, including LAN, WAN, QoS, and firewall configurations.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to diagnose and resolve complex voice communication issues.
* Effective communication and collaboration skills to work with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and end-users.
* Experience in creating user training materials and delivering training sessions to promote technology adoption.
* Knowledge of security best practices and compliance requirements related to voice communication data.
* Relevant Microsoft certifications, such as Microsoft Teams Administrator Associate or Microsoft 365 Certified: Enterprise Administrator Expert, are a plus.
* Project management skills with the ability to manage timelines, prioritize tasks, and coordinate implementation efforts.

title: Software Architect
description:
**What you’ll do**
------------------

**Role title: - Global Solutions Architect and Consultancy Manager**

**Role purpose:**  

Leading teams of global presales solution architects providing HLD/LLD of all types of Products for Business Enterprise Customers providing Consulting to VB partners globally  

Global Manager role caters to presales and post sales solution consultancy and architect covering all products portfolio; Cloud & Security, Messaging, SDWAN, IOT, UCC  

The Management of the Department is responsible for ensuring professional advice and the creation of technical offer documents for enterprise customers in the region.  

Furthermore, the management of the department is responsible for the implementation of the strategic guidelines of the Enterprise area, such as increasing the sales market share for fixed, mobile and digital services (IoT, UCC and cloud & hosting).  

The results of the department contribute to the value creation of the company, in particular through the creation of innovative concepts and offers adapted to the needs.  

The management of the department is responsible for leading and aligning all of its employees in the role of Customer Solution Architect (CSA) in the context of the division strategy, the department goals, the processes, the competencies and skills as well as the continuous further development of these aspects within the framework of the corporate HR strategy and -Requirements.  

In addition, the role is responsible for the technical management of an expert group. The goal here is to implement the following points nationwide for all CSA employees with a specialist focus: Information transparency on market and technology trends, identification and implementation of development measures for CS employees, development of standardized solution and consulting concepts, identification and implementation of measures to increase of the sales market share, ensuring and further development of optimized access models

**Who you are**
---------------

**Key accountabilities and decision ownership**  

* Lead global Team of Solution Architects and Senior Engineers providing Fixed, Messaging, SDWAN, Cloud and IoT Consulting Services to Vodafone operators in Europe, APAC, Middle East and Africa
* Lead the presales technical assessment, Planning and design of IP, Security and IoT/M2M solutions in a consistent way with the department product catalogue, strategy and architecture, delivering high level and low level design solutions Documents.
* Leading and managing virtual teams, managing different stakeholders from business, technology, operators during pre and post sales solution design and implementation phases.
* Evaluate and promote new solutions and integration with legacy systems, identify opportunities to add value to the business by resolving existing demands or issues through the reusability of existing products or solutions and advise and share experience on complex issues by providing technical guidance to project team members (consultancy)
* Act as the main technical representative of the competence area for different solutions of data, voice and cloud to all stakeholders including customer and technology management
* Develop and maintain Technical learning paths for different technical teams in data, virtualization , cloud and voice different tracks, Identify knowledge gaps within the area , analyze training needs and set up a training plan
* Responsible for the delivery, operational management, and Customer excellence with achievement of the contractual KPIs provided to Vodafone business customers.
* Drive growth, business development and business process transformation across all Local markets and group entities
* Drive and lead Digital and Business Process Transformation within the department providing efficiency target on yearly basis
* Manage P&L for the department meeting company targets and goals
* Responsible for building leadership capability, high skilled and Talented Employees within the department
* Set Performance Goals, Conduct Performance


Reviews and Evaluations with regular feedback  

for the direct reports in accordance with the company policy and alignment with management layer
Direct reports: 30 -50 FTE

**Core competencies, knowledge and experience :**  

* 6-8 years of experience in configuring and Troubleshooting different solutions of Fixed complex solutions
* 6-8 proven years of experience in managing different enterprise solutions for Vodafone Business
* 10 years of experience dealing with Enterprise customers with strong communication skills
* 5+ years of experience in technical delivery contents in voice and cloud across organization.
* Strong knowledge of cloud infrastructure with different cloud services
* Strong Knowledge in Network Automation preferable python
* Project Management and Agile Fundamentals
* Strong Analytical skills and troubleshooting skills
**Must have technical / professional qualifications:**  

* Bachelor’s degree in computer /telecommunications engineering.
* Master degree or equivalent in technology industry related to the role
* CCNA and CCNP is a plus
**Not a perfect fit?**
----------------------


Worried that you don’t meet all the desired criteria exactly? At Vodafone we are passionate about Inclusion for All and creating a workplace where everyone can thrive, whatever their personal or professional background. If you’re excited about this role but your experience doesn’t align exactly with every part of the job description, we encourage you to apply as you may be the right candidate for this role or another role, and our recruitment team can help you see how your skills fit in.

**What's in it for you**
------------------------

**Together we can**
-------------------

title: Operations Representative
description:
**Project Role :** Network Operations Representative  

**Project Role Description :** Configure, integrate and manage the life cycle of telecommunication network elements and associated configuration across Fulfillment and Assurance. Manage back office system data records. Support customer activations and configuration adjustments.
  

**Must have skills :** Cisco Network Services Orchestrator (NSO)  

**Good to have skills :** Enterprise Network Operations  

Minimum **7.5** year(s) of experience is required  

**Educational Qualification :** 15years full time education  

  

Summary: As a Network Operations Representative, you will be responsible for designing specialist solutions in line with business needs and acting as a service fulfillment and program SME. Your typical day will involve tracking and reporting performance measurements and SLAs of service fulfillment teams to the client, delivering business value to the project, and working with clients on performance and process optimization. Roles & Responsibilities: - Maintenance administration of Voice PBX systems services Responsible for handling day-to-day Voice operations, requirements issues - Managing maintaining Cisco Unified communication and collaboration, GENESYS, Five9 ,ININ contact center network, WebEx, Telepresence Infrastructure for various clients Managing maintaining MGCP, H323 gateways, CUBE / CUSP, SIP trunks and troubleshooting issues, Provide L3 / L4 support for operational activities , Vendor management for resolving major production Professional & Technical Skills: - Product/Solution knowledge Cisco UCC, WebEx Meetings, WebEx Teams, Cisco Meeting Server, TMS, VCS/Expressways, Voice gateways, CUBE/CUSP, Video Endpoints, Media Control Unit, Cisco Emergency Responder Sound technical knowledge and hands-on on Cisco UCC environment - Implementation and ongoing management of the Cisco UCC products Management and troubleshooting of complex environment - Good knowledge on WebEx control hub, Site admin, Video infrastructure components Implement the changes Additional Information: - The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Cisco Network Services Orchestrator (NSO). - The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful network solutions. - This position is based at our Bengaluru office.


  

15years full time education

title: Monitor
description:
**About this opportunity**
--------------------------

Surveillance Engineer is typically assigned to work with service quality surveillance / assurance Level 1 Operations activities in an operations organization. Role is to perform the surveillance activities and ensure that all the events on a network get escalated to the relevant function within the stipulated time period for restoration / resolution


**What you will do**
--------------------

* Service Alarm Monitoring
* Alarm Management for the assigned Network Services
* Ticket Management
* Monitoring all events in Customer's managed infrastructure in order to secure those services and resources are operating at optimum performance and within agreed SLA and to detect and intensify exceptions
* Responsible to interact with the resource and service instances to intercept, validate and/or collect network, IS/IT/Telecom Infrastructure events information for distribution to related processes.
* Fault remedy requiring on site presence is dispatched timely (as per the SLA / KPI) to the field operations organizations
* Work Order Handling
* Regular follow up on the events with relevant departments working on it as per the MSTOP process
* Work towards KPI & Balanced Scorecard parameters
* Work towards the IPM parameters assigned by the CA Manager
* End to end responsible for the incident ticket lifecycle.
* Alignment to the organizational guidelines & departmental processes & procedures

**Key Qualifications**
----------------------

* Qualifications: B.Tech in Electrical Engineering/Telecommunication Engineering/Computer Science.
* Industry experience: 3- 5Years In Telecom
* Certifications: Certification related to Telecom/IP shall be an added advantage

**Why join Ericsson?**
----------------------


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and creativity to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.


**What happens once you apply?**
--------------------------------

We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team.

title: Engineer
description:
Enea is Hiring!

**Implementation Engineer**

**About Enea:**


Enea is a world-leading specialist in software for telecom and cybersecurity. The company’s cloud-native solutions connect, optimize, and secure services for mobile subscribers, enterprises, and the Internet of Things. More than 100 communication service providers and 4.5 billion people rely on Enea technologies every day.


Enea has strengthened its product portfolio and global market position by integrating several acquisitions, including Qosmos, Openwave Mobility, Aptilo Networks, and AdaptiveMobile Security.

**Role Overview**


The successful candidate will be part of the Professional Services team reporting to our Technical Program Manager, helping to drive innovation and Planning.


The Professional Services team is responsible for the delivery and implementation of ENEA customer solutions.


As an Implementation Engineer, your role is to participate in customer delivery projects.


Solution delivery involves all aspects of technical implementation, including – design, installation & configuration, network integration, acceptance testing, go-live, and training.


You will be expected to apply technical knowledge and general skills to solve complex design and implementation problems.


The Ideal candidate Should be a quick learner, self-motivated, enthusiastic, and curious to learn new technologies, and can combine technical hands-on implementation work with the soft skills needed to engage with and delight our customers and other stakeholders. Ideally, the candidate should hold a computer science, engineering, or other related degree.

**Projects typically include:**

* Infrastructure:- The physical, virtual, and cloud infrastructure required to run the filter
* Traffic:- The acquisition of the traffic to be filtered
* Filtering:- Definition and configuration of filtering logic and rules
* Reporting:-Streaming traffic and filter results data for analysis and reporting

**Core role responsibilities:**

* Ensure that the purpose and requirements of the solution are clearly defined and understood by all stakeholders and determine how these are going to be achieved
* Resolve complex functional and integration design issues by working with the customer and with other teams internally
* Installation and configuration of software product application and OS
* Integration and testing of product applications
* Prepare and execute customer facing ATP and drive the resolution of issues arising
* Launch customer solution in production
* Train customers on the product and solution
* Problem Solving and troubleshooting

**Preferred experience and knowledge:**

* 3 to 5 years of Experience
* Application software on Linux
* Linux OS, Kubernetes, Docker
* IP networking, TCP, SCTP
* Messaging: SMS, SMPP, RCS, MMS, SIP
* Signaling: SS7, Diameter, GTP-C, 5G
* Kafka and Kafka Streams, ElasticSearch, Kibana, SQL, REST API
* Consul, Nginx, haproxy
* AWS, Azure, IBM Cloud
* python, shell scripting

**What we can offer you:**

* Hybrid working Model.
* The opportunity to work with a Industry Leading organisation and the forefront of telecommunication security industry where a great performance is quickly recognized.
* Competitive Salary
* Twenty Days PTO, rising to twenty Five days in line with the length of service
* Paid health care plan(General Insurance, Term life cover, Accidental Insurance and Travel Insurance)
* Company Bonus Scheme
* Free access to Learning Platforms.

**A few final details**


Full time/37.5 hours per week


Location: Hyderabad and international travel if/where required


Expected start date: Immediately


Some shift work (Night, Saturday or Sunday) will be required for this role


Please contact HR@Enea.com if there is anything you would like to know more and a member of our team will be happy to help.


Enea AdaptiveMobile Security is an equal opportunities employer.

title: Software Engineer
description:
#### **About the job HMI Software Developer/ Specialist Qt**


**Work Type:** WFO (Work From Office)

**Work Location: Bangalore** (Candidates must be willing to work on-site (Whitefield))


**﻿E****mbedded Systems**

  

* **﻿**IVI (In vehicle infotainment) OR IC (instrument cluster)

  

**Job Description:**



﻿**Role:** **HMI Software Developer/ Specialist Qt**


**Brief Job Description:**

  

* Develop and maintain Qt-based HMI software using QML and C++ for Automotive Instrument Cluster or Infotainment systems.﻿


**Experience/ Skill Requirements:**

  

* 3 to 9 years of experience with strong technical expertise in Qt-based Automotive HMI software development using QML and C++
* Good system level overview on technical software architecture for advanced Instrument Cluster and/or Infotainment systems
* Experience on automotive embedded platforms with RTOS environments based on Integrity (preferred)/ QNX/ Linux
* HMI Framework experience with wayland and layer manager knowledge
* Strong in performance optimization topics and in debugging complex HMI issues
* Good understanding of SDLC lifecycle and Agile delivery processes
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
* Fast learner who can quickly assimilate in-house HMI architectures, frameworks, tools and methods﻿

 **Advanced knowledge of one or more of following topics would be desirable:**


* Development of 3D HMI applications using Qt 3D and implementation of custom shaders
* Development of IVI middleware components based on GENIVI etc.﻿

 **﻿Educational Qualifications:**


* BE/ B.Tech (Computer Science , Electronics, Electrical, Instrumentation, Telecommunication), ME/ M.Tech)

title: Security Specialist
description:
**What you will do !**

* Design & implementation of secure data collection from customer network
* Support business in handling technical discussion with customer to secure approval for data transfer to Ericsson side.
* Continuous data delivery to other Ericsson IT service / system (such as: ITK, ENI, CDS, and MA local solutions)
* Ad-hoc data delivery to user group
* Authorization mechanism that allows new data consumer to apply access and be approved by relevant information owner or custodian.
* Audit trail of access to collected data by all data consumer (system or user groups)
* Allows for CU / end user to raise suggestion for KPI formula, that will be reviewed and approved before it can be introduced into the system.

 **You will bring**

  



Solid understanding of security controls (e.g. access control, auditing, authentication, encryption, integrity, physical security, and application security)

* Working knowledge of scanning tools (Nessus, Qualys, IBM AppScan, etc.)
* Strong understanding of enterprise, network, system and application level security issues
* Understanding of enterprise computing environments, distributed applications, and a strong understanding of TCP/IP networks also with available security control (technical & process control) for respective layers
* Experience writing technical reports and executive summaries
* The ability to provide support after normal business hours
* The ability to work constructively under pressure
* Ability to work both in a team as well as individually
* Participate in the out-of-hours on call rotation, providing technical support to the business for incidents
* Knowledge sharing and collaboration skills
* Deliver results and meet customer expectations
* Excellent communication skills; English is a must

 **Key Qualifications:**

  

Education: BE/ B.Tech (Telecommunication/ Computer Science)

* 8 years experience with at least 3 years in IT and 2 year in Security with 1-2 years of experience performing vulnerability assessments
* ITIL certification, CCSP, OSCP, Security +, CCNA Security or similar will be an advantage
* Basic knowledge of telecommunications networks will be an added advantage

**Why Join Ericsson?**

  

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.

  

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we nurture it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team.

  

We are proud to announce Ericsson India is ranked among **Top 50 companies** in the country and is once again officially Great Place to Work Certified™ in 2023. Every year, more than 10,000 organizations from over 60 countries partner with the Great Place to Work® Institute for assessment, benchmarking and planning actions to strengthen their workplace culture and this Certification acknowledges our employees value their employee experience and our workplace culture.”

title: Operations Associate
company: Screen Magic Mobile Media Pvt. Ltd.
description:
**Job Overview**


The Messaging Operations Specialist will be responsible for overseeing and optimizing all aspects of messaging operations for our US providers. This role involves a combination of technical expertise, communication skills, and a keen understanding of the US telecommunications industry. The ideal candidate will be proactive, analytical, and capable of managing multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.

**Key Responsibilities**


Messaging Services Management:

* Monitor and maintain messaging services to ensure high availability and performance.
* Collaborate with technical teams and network providers to troubleshoot and resolve any messaging delivery issues promptly.


Compliance and Regulations:

* Stay abreast of industry regulations, compliance standards, and best practices related to messaging services in the US.
* Implement and enforce compliance measures to ensure adherence to regulatory requirements.


Provider Relationship Management:

* Develop and maintain strong relationships with messaging service providers, ensuring service level agreements (SLAs) are met.
* Act as the primary point of contact for provider-related issues and escalations.


Documentation and Training:

* Maintain documentation related to messaging operations, configurations, and procedures.
* Provide training to internal teams on messaging systems and best practices. Collaboration and Communication:
* Work closely with cross-functional teams, including Engineering, Customer support and Customer Success, to ensure seamless integration of messaging services.
* Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders and external providers to address queries and concerns.

**Qualifications & skills:**


Degree in Engineering or a related field


Proven experience in messaging operations or a related role.


In-depth knowledge of messaging platforms, protocols, and industry standards. Familiarity with US telecommunications regulations and compliance requirements. Relevant experience of 4+ years

**Job Location**: Pune Office

title: Senior Automation Engineer
description:
Job: IRC212631
  

Location: India - Pune
  

Designation: Associate Consultant
  

Experience: 5-10 years
  

Function: Engineering
  

Skills: ISO 26262, Public Safety and Security, Standard Safety Procedures
  

Work Model: Hybrid
  
**Description:**
----------------


Join GlobalLogic, to be a valid part of the team working on a huge software project for the world-class company providing M2M / IoT 4G/5G modules e.g. to the automotive, healthcare and logistics industries. Through our engagement, we contribute to our customer in developing the end-user modules’ firmware, implementing new features, maintaining compatibility with the newest telecommunication and industry standards, as well as performing analysis and estimations of the customer requirements.


**Requirements:**
-----------------


Senior Automated Driving Safety Engineer



Summary of Responsibilities:


* Define the Functional, Technical and SOTIF Safety requirements and create the technical documentation as required by the safety process life cycle.
* Define the safety plan in support of the program timing, and support the definition of the technical verification and validation plan of the system
* Participate as a senior specialist in future EE architecture design for safety related functions for in-house development and ensure that safety concepts are adequate and implemented
* Perform and/or review safety analyses (CCA/CMA/DFMEA/FTA and FMEDA) as required for EE systems and safety related vehicle functions
* Identify and correct critical issues and non-compliance with any of the applicable requirements of ISO26262 and ISO21448.
* Support advanced and pre-development as a key member of a cross functional team
* Review safety deliverables to assure Stellantis requirements are supported and manage the DIA.
* Lead or participate in reviews of Functional safety and SOTIF process work products
* Coach engineering teams on SOTIF and Functional Safety process
* Actively participate in Functional Safety and SOTIF workgroups, as assigned, to support development or continuous improvement in processes
* Perform consistent with and promote safety culture within the organization.



Basic Qualifications:  

* Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering, Applied Physics, Mechanical Engineering, or equivalent (Materials/Chemical/Civil/ Aerospace/Computer) from an ABET accredited or equivalent university
* 8 years of total engineering experience including 3 years experience with application of Functional Safety and/or SOTIF Safety practices to projects with product launch success
* Demonstrated ability to apply the V-model development process
* Demonstrated competency in Systems Engineering and problem resolution
* Experience with DVP&R and DFMEA or FTA creation and execution
* Good problem solving skills
* Good communication and interpersonal skills
* Proficient understanding of ISO 26262:2018
* Demonstrated understanding of vehicle architectures
* Demonstrated understanding of basic functional building blocks of an Automated Driving Systems
* Demonstrated ability for on time delivery of quality work products
* Self-starter with an ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
  


  

**Job Responsibilities:**
-------------------------


Preferred Qualifications:  

* MS or PhD in Applied Physics, Mechanical, Electrical, Aerospace or Computer Engineering from an ABET accredited university
* Trained and certified in ISO26262 as a Functional Safety Engineer
* Proficient understanding of FDIS 21448:2021
* Demonstrated understanding of vehicle dynamics
* Active in an industry working group (SAE, ISO, IEEE…etc)
* Experience with STPA
  

  

**What We Offer**
-----------------


**Exciting Projects:** We focus on industries like High-Tech, communication, media, healthcare, retail and telecom. Our customer list is full of fantastic global brands and leaders who love what we build for them.


**Collaborative Environment:** You Can expand your skills by collaborating with a diverse team of highly talented people in an open, laidback environment — or even abroad in one of our global centers or client facilities!


**Work-Life Balance:** GlobalLogic prioritizes work-life balance, which is why we offer flexible work schedules, opportunities to work from home, and paid time off and holidays.


**Professional Development:** Our dedicated Learning & Development team regularly organizes Communication skills training(GL Vantage, Toast Master),Stress Management program, professional certifications, and technical and soft skill trainings.


**Excellent Benefits:** We provide our employees with competitive salaries, family medical insurance, Group Term Life Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance , NPS(National Pension Scheme ), Periodic health awareness program, extended maternity leave, annual performance bonuses, and referral bonuses.


**Fun Perks:** We want you to love where you work, which is why we host sports events, cultural activities, offer food on subsidies rates, Corporate parties. Our vibrant offices also include dedicated GL Zones, rooftop decks and GL Club where you can drink coffee or tea with your colleagues over a game of table and offer discounts for popular stores and restaurants!


**About GlobalLogic**
---------------------


GlobalLogic is a leader in digital engineering. We help brands across the globe design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating experience design, complex engineering, and data expertise—we help our clients imagine what’s possible, and accelerate their transition into tomorrow’s digital businesses. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, GlobalLogic operates design studios and engineering centers around the world, extending our deep expertise to customers in the automotive, communications, financial services, healthcare and life sciences, manufacturing, media and entertainment, semiconductor, and technology industries. GlobalLogic is a Hitachi Group Company operating under Hitachi, Ltd. (TSE: 6501) which contributes to a sustainable society with a higher quality of life by driving innovation through data and technology as the Social Innovation Business.

Experience: 5-10 years
  

Function: Engineering
  

Skills: ISO 26262, Public Safety and Security, Standard Safety Procedures
  

Work Model: Hybrid
  
**Description:**
----------------


Join GlobalLogic, to be a valid part of the team working on a huge software project for the world-class company providing M2M / IoT 4G/5G modules e.g. to the automotive, healthcare and logistics industries. Through our engagement, we contribute to our customer in developing the end-user modules’ firmware, implementing new features, maintaining compatibility with the newest telecommunication and industry standards, as well as performing analysis and estimations of the customer requirements.


**Requirements:**
-----------------


Senior Automated Driving Safety Engineer

  



Basic Qualifications:  

* Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering, Applied Physics, Mechanical Engineering, or equivalent (Materials/Chemical/Civil/ Aerospace/Computer) from an ABET accredited or equivalent university
* 8 years of total engineering experience including 3 years experience with application of Functional Safety and/or SOTIF Safety practices to projects with product launch success
* Demonstrated ability to apply the V-model development process
* Demonstrated competency in Systems Engineering and problem resolution
* Experience with DVP&R and DFMEA or FTA creation and execution
* Good problem solving skills
* Good communication and interpersonal skills
* Proficient understanding of ISO 26262:2018
* Demonstrated understanding of vehicle architectures
* Demonstrated understanding of basic functional building blocks of an Automated Driving Systems
* Demonstrated ability for on time delivery of quality work products
* Self-starter with an ability to work independently with minimal supervision.


Preferred Qualifications:  

* MS or PhD in Applied Physics, Mechanical, Electrical, Aerospace or Computer Engineering from an ABET accredited university
* Trained and certified in ISO26262 as a Functional Safety Engineer
* Proficient understanding of FDIS 21448:2021
* Demonstrated understanding of vehicle dynamics
* Active in an industry working group (SAE, ISO, IEEE…etc)
* Experience with STPA
  

  

**Job Responsibilities:**
-------------------------


Summary of Responsibilities:  

* Define the Functional, Technical and SOTIF Safety requirements and create the technical documentation as required by the safety process life cycle.
* Define the safety plan in support of the program timing, and support the definition of the technical verification and validation plan of the system
* Participate as a senior specialist in future EE architecture design for safety related functions for in-house development and ensure that safety concepts are adequate and implemented
* Perform and/or review safety analyses (CCA/CMA/DFMEA/FTA and FMEDA) as required for EE systems and safety related vehicle functions
* Identify and correct critical issues and non-compliance with any of the applicable requirements of ISO26262 and ISO21448.
* Support advanced and pre-development as a key member of a cross functional team
* Review safety deliverables to assure Stellantis requirements are supported and manage the DIA.
* Lead or participate in reviews of Functional safety and SOTIF process work products
* Coach engineering teams on SOTIF and Functional Safety process
* Actively participate in Functional Safety and SOTIF workgroups, as assigned, to support development or continuous improvement in processes
* Perform consistent with and promote safety culture within the organization.
  

  

**What We Offer**
-----------------


**Exciting Projects:** We focus on industries like High-Tech, communication, media, healthcare, retail and telecom. Our customer list is full of fantastic global brands and leaders who love what we build for them.


**Collaborative Environment:** You Can expand your skills by collaborating with a diverse team of highly talented people in an open, laidback environment — or even abroad in one of our global centers or client facilities!


**Work-Life Balance:** GlobalLogic prioritizes work-life balance, which is why we offer flexible work schedules, opportunities to work from home, and paid time off and holidays.


**Professional Development:** Our dedicated Learning & Development team regularly organizes Communication skills training(GL Vantage, Toast Master),Stress Management program, professional certifications, and technical and soft skill trainings.


**Excellent Benefits:** We provide our employees with competitive salaries, family medical insurance, Group Term Life Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance , NPS(National Pension Scheme ), Periodic health awareness program, extended maternity leave, annual performance bonuses, and referral bonuses.


**Fun Perks:** We want you to love where you work, which is why we host sports events, cultural activities, offer food on subsidies rates, Corporate parties. Our vibrant offices also include dedicated GL Zones, rooftop decks and GL Club where you can drink coffee or tea with your colleagues over a game of table and offer discounts for popular stores and restaurants!


**About GlobalLogic**
---------------------


GlobalLogic is a leader in digital engineering. We help brands across the globe design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating experience design, complex engineering, and data expertise—we help our clients imagine what’s possible, and accelerate their transition into tomorrow’s digital businesses. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, GlobalLogic operates design studios and engineering centers around the world, extending our deep expertise to customers in the automotive, communications, financial services, healthcare and life sciences, manufacturing, media and entertainment, semiconductor, and technology industries. GlobalLogic is a Hitachi Group Company operating under Hitachi, Ltd. (TSE: 6501) which contributes to a sustainable society with a higher quality of life by driving innovation through data and technology as the Social Innovation Business.

title: Software Architect
description:
Solution Architect


**Job Req ID:** 30154
**Posting Date:** 21 Feb 2024
**Function:** Data & AI
**Unit:** Digital
**Location:**RMZ Ecoworld, Devarabeesanahal, Bengaluru, India
**Salary:** competitive
**Why this job matters**

BT is building a world class Data & AI function within it’s Global & Digital businesses as part of its strategy to put data and actionable insight at the heart of everything it does and deliver on its Digital Transformation Programme to enhance the experience of its customers. This is key to delivering next generation products and key business processes across Sales & Marketing, Service Delivery and Service Assurance. Looking ahead we want to harness data and exploit specifically AI/ML technologies; we want people in the company and our customers to self-serve, make our operations smarter and create ‘best in class’ data driven innovative products our customers will love. For example, predicting service impacting incidents before they occur using network telemetry data, identifying jeopardy in delivery plans based on historical events, or personalising upsell opportunities by harnessing a 360-degree view of the customer, up to leveraging IoT to support big initiatives such as ‘smart cities.  

This role is to work as a Solutions Architect as part of our Solution and Architectural Design Function. If you have experience of data architecture and have the skills and experience to perform in the role of a Solutions Architect we would love to hear from you!  

You will be leading a team and championing activity across the business which means you will be playing a very visible role in the business and have engagement with several stakeholders including those at a senior level.
**What you’ll be doing**
* Drive implementation of the IT strategic architecture aligned to the business and operational digital transformation strategy
* Actively contribute to the definition of the overall solution framework for the respective domain aligned to the business strategy in this space, in collaboration with business stakeholders
* To support, guide and mentor Solution Design Professional in the domain to develop and deliver no-defect solutions within architectural guardrails, focussed on convergence with the IT strategic architecture
* To interface and manage all senior stakeholders (business / enterprise architects) in the respective domain independently
* Applies specialist technical expertise to develop and advise approach on a range of complex, high impact and high risk customer solutions and define the architectural strategy for the respective domain
* Accountable for defining and maintaining the architectural roadmap for the respective domain
* Creates, owns and implements the technical solutions and inputs into the roadmaps for the respective domain
* Liaises with CFU and customer stakeholders, ensuring business needs are met through assurance of the design
* To work with programme managers and colleagues across BT to ensure programmes /projects are successful



You'll Have The Following Skills & Experience
* Solution Architecture - You can drive the implementation of the solution framework in collaboration with senior business and operations stakeholder
* Integrating Data platforms (Cloud) into SaaS / PaaS ecosystems for the best balance in terms of data consistency, easiness to access/exploit and cost
* Product and service knowledge - You demonstrate subject matter expertise in complex telecom infrastructure, products and services. You develop scalable and re-usable solutions to address business requirements
* Be agile - You lead collaborative ways of working and continuous improvement. You encourage their adoption where necessary to deliver the best results for the customer
* Able to work effectively as part of a geographically dispersed team, but also to act independently in progressing work.
* Technology excellence - You maintain a deep expertise in emerging technology trends. You use specialised skills and knowledge to guide the business and develop content to support the sharing of complex technical information
* Improvement focus - You collaborate to identify how work activities across teams are related and highlight inefficiencies. You help to remove barriers and find the resources or support needed to improve processes
* Should have prior hands-on experience on designing end-to-end solutions in the Telecommunications domain
* Should have prior knowledge on TMF Framework or similar industry wide standard
* Showcased expertise on a project or a specific piece of work or led a project outside of the core areas of your expertise
* Volunteered for extra responsibility such as project team involvement/leadership
* Proven experience in line management and matrix management and in guiding / leading virtual/ matrix teams in complex organisations
* Taught your team how to do their roles more effectively
* Aligned project plans and objectives with BT strategy and values
* Made decisions in ambiguous situations using incomplete information or differing opinions (eg divided team loyalties or unclear deliverables).
* Managed a low performing team to a successful outcome
* Undertook a teambuilding exercise and measured your team's motivation & feedback
* Managed headcount and departmental costs when cost was under pressure
* Actively participated in strategy setting sessions
* Been a spokesperson for others on issues of integrity
* To suit the needs of a customer, colleague or client; moved outside of expected process or practice


Other skills beneficial for the role are:  

* Experience working the big data and/or cloud computing technologies an advantage (preferably GCP).
* Good Degree Level (preferably Engineering or Computer Science)
* Experience with Data Meshes architectures
* Delivery experience in an Agile context with strong collaboration with the engineering teams.


**Our leadership standards**
**Looking in:**  

**Leading inclusively and Safely**  

I inspire and build trust through self-awareness, honesty and integrity.  

**Owning outcomes**  

I take the right decisions that benefit the broader organisation.
**Looking out:**  

**Delivering for the customer**  

I execute brilliantly on clear priorities that add value to our customers and the wider business.  

**Commercially savvy**  

I demonstrate strong commercial focus, bringing an external perspective to decision-making.
**Looking to the future:**  

**Growth mindset**  

I experiment and identify opportunities for growth for both myself and the organisation.  

**Building for the future**  

I build diverse future-ready teams where all individuals can be at their best.**About us**
BT is part of BT Group, along with EE, Openreach, and Plusnet.
Millions of people rely on us every day to help them live their lives, power their businesses, and keep their public services running. We connect friends to family, clients to colleagues, people to possibilities. We keep the wheels of business spinning, and the emergency services responding.
We value diversity and celebrate difference. ‘We embed diversity and inclusion into everything that we do. It’s fundamental to our purpose: we connect for good.’
We all stick to the same values: Personal, Simple, and Brilliant. From day one, you’ll get stuck in to tough challenges, pitch in with ideas, make things happen. But you won’t be alone: we’ll be there with help and support, learning and development.
This is your chance to make a real difference to the world: to be part of the digital transformation of countless lives and businesses. Grab it.  


**A FEW POINTS TO NOTE:**
Although these roles are listed as full-time, if you’re a job share partnership, work reduced hours, or any other way of working flexibly, please still get in touch.
**DON'T MEET EVERY SINGLE REQUIREMENT?**
Studies have shown that women and people who are disabled, LGBTQ+, neurodiverse or from ethnic minority backgrounds are less likely to apply for jobs unless they meet every single qualification and criteria. We're committed to building a diverse, inclusive, and authentic workplace where everyone can be their best, so if you're excited about this role but your past experience doesn't align perfectly with every requirement on the Job Description, please apply anyway - you may just be the right candidate for this or other roles in our wider team.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Job ID:** 184987
  

**Required Travel** : Minimal
  

**Managerial - No**  

**Location:** **India- Gurgaon (Amdocs Site)**

**In one sentence**
-------------------

VUBIQUITY, part of the Amdocs Media division, connects content owners and video distributors to deliver media to viewers on any screen. Working with 600+ leading film studios, television networks, independent producers and digital first networks, VUBIQUITY brings premium content to over 1,000 global video distributors. VUBIQUITY has teams in Los Angeles, Toronto, Cyprus, London and India.  



The Software Developer Specialist participates in all stages of development of the application within the enterprise.


**All you need is...**
----------------------

+ 6+ years of proven work experience using Microsoft .NET Framework
+ Working experience in Visual Basic and C# programming language
+ Experience working with legacy applications dating back ~10 years
+ Experience working with .Net Framework 4.0 onwards
+ Experience of working with MS SQL Server
+ Experience of using online source control and code repositories e.g. GitHub
+ Familiar with the principles of RESTful interface design
+ Working knowledge of Agile frameworks (SCRUM) and using Test Driven Development
+ Strong critical thinking skills, an analytical mind, and problem-solving aptitude
+ BSc (preferably in computer science, engineering, or related field)
**Who are we?**
---------------

If you’re a smartphone user then you are part of an ever more connected and digital world. At Amdocs, we are leading the digital revolution into the future. From virtualized telecommunications networks, Big Data and Internet of Things to mobile financial services, billing and operational support systems, we are continually evolving our business to help you become more connected. We make sure that when you watch a video on YouTube, message friends on Snapchat or send your images on Instagram, you get great service anytime, anywhere, and on any device. We are at the heart of the telecommunications industry working with giants such as AT&T, Vodafone, Telstra and Telefonica, helping them create an amazing new world for you where technology is being used in amazing new ways every single day.


**What will your job look like?**
---------------------------------

* You will review and analyze platform requirements, create design and estimates
* You will collaborate with other developers and architects to create effective solutions
* You will research emerging technologies and techniques
* You will work with QA/test engineers to create unit tests and test strategies
* You will generate documentation
* You will troubleshoot and fix issues.
* You will work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality and understanding throughout the software development lifecycle
**Why you will love this job:**
-------------------------------

* The chance to serve as a specialist in software and technology.
* You will take an active role in technical mentoring within the team.
* We provide stellar benefits from health to dental to paid time off and parental leave!
**Amdocs is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workforce**

title: Recruiter
description:
Responsible for end to end talent acquisition.

 Discuss with SBU heads and line managers to understand their recruitment needs

 Prepare/Collect Job Descriptions/ MRF\\* form for the job openings

 Prepare the job advertisement if required and decide how and where the jobs will be

advertised

 Post the opening in various internal and external advertising mediums

 Work closely with consultants to source, screen& shortlist resumes

 Coordinate with shortlisted candidates as well as interviewers and prepare interview

schedule

 Devise and run selection processes including interviews, psychometric tests, personality

questionnaires and various group activities.

title: Software Architect
description:
**Company Description**  

At ServiceNow, our technology makes the world work for everyone, and our people make it possible. We move fast because the world can’t wait, and we innovate in ways no one else can for our customers and communities. By joining ServiceNow, you are part of an ambitious team of change makers who have a restless curiosity and a drive for ingenuity. We know that your best work happens when you live your best life and share your unique talents, so we do everything we can to make that possible. We dream big together, supporting each other to make our individual and collective dreams come true. The future is ours, and it starts with you.


With more than 7,700+ customers, we serve approximately 85% of the Fortune 500®, and we're proud to be one of FORTUNE 100 Best Companies to Work For® and World's Most Admired Companies™.


Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow.


Unsure if you meet all the qualifications of a job description but are deeply excited about the role? We still encourage you to apply! At ServiceNow, we are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all voices are heard, valued, and respected. We welcome all candidates, including individuals from non-traditional, varied backgrounds, that might not come from a typical path connected to this role. We believe skills and experience are transferrable, and the desire to dream big makes for great candidates.

 **Job Description**  

A Manager in the Customer Workflows Expert Service team is a position in our professional services (Customer Outcomes) organisation focused on all aspects of leading an expert team of resources (Business and Technical Consultants) in timely, high quality delivery work for ServiceNow customers. This work can consist of consultation, advisory guidance, and implementation work relating to the ServiceNow platform products and processes. This position will manage a team in India, and reports to the APJ Customer and Employee Workflows leader. We are looking for an Technical Architect that has managed people in the past.

**What you get to do in this role:**

* Provide business and technical leadership to our Consultants, Customers, and Partners – often in a billable capacity within an engagement, guiding the team and customer down a prescriptive solution design and manage through the technical implementation decision points
* Directly responsible for hiring, ensuring enablement of, developing, and managing high-performing experts who consult, implement, and configure the ServiceNow Customer and Employee Workflows products for our customers and with our Partner Ecosystem.
* Support services go to market motion in sales pursuits, to propose strategy and ensure leading practice solutions and accurate delivery scoping, supporting the sales effort and estimation that refine the customer vision and capabilities into activities and estimates.
* Review expert service proposals from scoping and technical angle, validating the effort estimation. Present and defend solutions to the customer at all stages of the engagement to ensure adoption and value realization. Closely work with existing customers to upsell and cross-sell. Go-to person for the customer to access expert services and the technical team.
* Partner with internal teams to support training, enablement, product management, and best practices organisations.
* Promote and drive continuous improvement practices for delivery/engagement materials, contributing thought leadership (methodology and white papers), via your team, on how Advisory, Expert Services, and Co-Delivery can optimize to achieve customer outcomes
* Build and nurture the Business Unit (BU) relationship through partnership for joint goals.
* Meet with customer leadership to position the use of expert resources as part of different engagement models, including co-delivery with partners, advisory expertise, and independent implementation work.
* Collaborate with the Leading Practice resources in the design and build of the portfolio for Platform products and capabilities with BUs, Solution Consulting, Marketing, and Innovation organisations.
* Manage a team of 4-12 Technical Consultants
* Responsible for all aspects of employee performance management for your team, including career development, performance reviews, Individual Development Plans, guidance and mentoring
* Responsible for managing the successful achievement of the Consultants’ KPIs, Quality Assurance of the customer engagements for your direct reports
* Key Performance Measurements may include but are not limited to:
	+ Traditional professional services business measurements (budgets, revenue, etc.)
	+ Productivity / utilisation
	+ Customer satisfaction scores
	+ Product consumption and/or adoption
	+ Talent recruitment and development
* Up to 25% travel annually

  

**Qualifications** **To be successful in this role you have:**

* 5+ years of consulting experience for complex, global organisations, preferably in a platform architecture capacity.
* 2+ years of leadership experience in a professional services organisation in one (or more) of the following roles (required):
	+ Expert Services
	+ Implementation
	+ Architecture
	+ Product Management
	+ Services Sales
	+ Process Engineering
	+ Program/Project Management
* Technical delivery experience with ServiceNow Customer Workflows and Platform products.
* Architectural experience with ServiceNow Platform products.
* Experience with professional services resource management.
* Strong interpersonal skills, customer-centric attitude, and a passion for cultural diversity.
* A history of leading, mentoring and developing talent across a team of seven or more employees.
* Strong organisational and time management skills.
* Experience working with budgeting, forecasting, cost allocations using tools and an understanding of cost accounting.
* Experience working within Agile or Scaled Agile frameworks.
* Experience designing and developing service capabilities.
* Ability to interface and develop relationships with other ServiceNow departments, in particular Product Management, Product Development, Product Marketing, Training, Sales, Presales and Enablement teams.
* Proactive attitude, critical thinking, problem solving, escalation, and conflict resolution.
* Outstanding communication skills (both written and verbal) with highly confident presentation and facilitation skills.
* A track record of distilling customer needs from leaders (including CXO roles) to provide guidance and direction.
* Proven ability to influence and consult successfully about digital transformation and PaaS based application development.
* Experience leading/owning low code application development (LCAP) platform-based solutions.
* Experience working with customers in in 1 or more industry verticals (Telecommunications, Banking/Financial Services, Healthcare, Government, etc.).
* ServiceNow Certified Implementation Specialist (preferably CSM, but also FSM or HRSD)
* Any additional platform-based certifications are a benefit (Flow Designer, Service Portal, Virtual Agent, Now Intelligence products, etc.).
* Industry certifications that may include the following are a benefit:
	+ TOGAF
	+ ITIL v3 or 4 Foundation and/or Advanced ITIL Certifications

  

**Additional Information**  

ServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status or any other category protected by law.


At ServiceNow, we lead with flexibility and trust in our distributed world of work. Click here to learn about our work personas: flexible, remote and required-in-office.


If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are limited in the ability or unable to access or use this online application process and need an alternative method for applying, you may contact us at talent.acquisition@servicenow.com for assistance.


For positions requiring access to technical data subject to export control regulations, including Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may have to obtain export licensing approval from the U.S. Government for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by the U.S. Government.


Please Note: Fraudulent job postings/job scams are increasingly common. Click here to learn what to watch out for and how to protect yourself. All genuine ServiceNow job postings can be found through the ServiceNow Careers site.

  



From Fortune. © 2022 Fortune Media IP Limited All rights reserved. Used under license.


Fortune and Fortune Media IP Limited are not affiliated with, and do not endorse products or services of, ServiceNow.

title: Product Specialist
description:
Job: IRC210359
  

Location: India - Noida
  

Designation: Specialist
  

Experience: 10-15 years
  

Function: Business Solutions
  

Skills: Managerial Support, process management; negotiation; market analysis; identification of business needs; creation of technical specifications, Product Management, Program Management
  

Work Model: Hybrid
  
**Description:**
----------------


Join GlobalLogic, to be a valid part of the team working on a huge software project for the world-class company providing M2M / IoT 4G/5G modules e.g. to the automotive, healthcare and logistics industries. Through our engagement, we contribute to our customer in developing the end-user modules’ firmware, implementing new features, maintaining compatibility with the newest telecommunication and industry standards, as well as performing analysis and estimations of the customer requirements.


**Requirements:**
-----------------


About the Opportunity:



We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Operations Manager to join our thriving Product Management, Consulting and Design Group, overseeing a talented team of 300+ experienced professionals. You will play a pivotal role in Growth, Motivation and sustenance, enhancing team collaboration, and driving operational excellence, ultimately enabling our people to be connected and supported at all times.  

Key Experience Expectations



Qualifications:



Overall experience of 16+ years in the IT services industry having played a leadership role in Consulting, Product Management  

Strategy, and/or PreSales areas with at least 8+ years with one of the Tier 1 organizations like (IBM, Accenture, Cognizant, TCS, Wipro, HCL etc.)  

Engineering + MBA degree from Tier 1 institutes like (IIT/BITS/IIM/SPJIMR/FMS etc.) preferred  

Should have people management experience of managing 50+ member teams across multiple geographies  

Exceptional executive communication skills (oral/presentation/written) – able to address all levels of the organization including the C-Suite and members of the board. Able to create/deliver audience appropriate presentations and be persuasive.  

Capable of having strategic conversations at the executive level and tactical discussions across teams to ensure a proper vision and our ability to execute remain in lock step  

Superior organizational skills – able to keep multiple balls in the air and maintain a comprehensive understanding of the program/charter, including details of individual work streams.  

Has passion for technology and delivering outstanding business solutions  

Able to make effective decisions under pressure and work in a fast paced environment



Additional Role Qualifications/Details:



Valid US B1/B2 visa and/or Europe visa  

Onsite global client facing role for 1+ year would be great  

Travel within India and Overseas (US/Europe) expected to be 25-30%  

HR Base location will be NCR/Noida, Work Location is going to be flexible under pandemic

  


  

**Job Responsibilities:**
-------------------------

  

About the Opportunity:  

We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Operations Manager to join our thriving Product Management, Consulting and Design Group, overseeing a talented team of 300+ experienced professionals. You will play a pivotal role in Growth, Motivation and sustenance, enhancing team collaboration, and driving operational excellence, ultimately enabling our people to be connected and supported at all times.



Responsibilities:



Lead current insurance domain BA’s, Product owner and Product manager’s team  

Manage the Insurance Vertical PreSales charter for Delivery led growth and support Global PreSales to grow consulting charter for insurance pursuits closely  

Play key anchor role in Development and Execution of insurance centric consulting advisories which can be GlobalLogic offerings involving consultative client engagement leading to large scale Digital Transformation deals.  

Anchor large scale pursuits for GlobalLogic for complex and large ($10-20 Million) Digital Transformation deals leading overall Solution, Approach and Execution narrative and stitching a winning theme  

Has in the past led Delivery programs with 100+ member teams so is fully versed with Solutioning, Scope,Estimation, Roadmap, Program Management, Governance creation for large scale pursuits  

Demonstrates through his/her role Thought Leadership, Domain/Industry POVs and Subject Matter Expertise  

while collaborating with cross-functional global teams  

Act as a role model, identify & create career paths for building, engaging & retaining top talent by assessing performance and potential at all levels.

  


  

**What We Offer**
-----------------


**Exciting Projects:** We focus on industries like High-Tech, communication, media, healthcare, retail and telecom. Our customer list is full of fantastic global brands and leaders who love what we build for them.


**Collaborative Environment:** You Can expand your skills by collaborating with a diverse team of highly talented people in an open, laidback environment — or even abroad in one of our global centers or client facilities!


**Work-Life Balance:** GlobalLogic prioritizes work-life balance, which is why we offer flexible work schedules, opportunities to work from home, and paid time off and holidays.


**Professional Development:** Our dedicated Learning & Development team regularly organizes Communication skills training(GL Vantage, Toast Master),Stress Management program, professional certifications, and technical and soft skill trainings.


**Excellent Benefits:** We provide our employees with competitive salaries, family medical insurance, Group Term Life Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance , NPS(National Pension Scheme ), Periodic health awareness program, extended maternity leave, annual performance bonuses, and referral bonuses.


**Fun Perks:** We want you to love where you work, which is why we host sports events, cultural activities, offer food on subsidies rates, Corporate parties. Our vibrant offices also include dedicated GL Zones, rooftop decks and GL Club where you can drink coffee or tea with your colleagues over a game of table and offer discounts for popular stores and restaurants!


**About GlobalLogic**
---------------------


GlobalLogic is a leader in digital engineering. We help brands across the globe design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating experience design, complex engineering, and data expertise—we help our clients imagine what’s possible, and accelerate their transition into tomorrow’s digital businesses. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, GlobalLogic operates design studios and engineering centers around the world, extending our deep expertise to customers in the automotive, communications, financial services, healthcare and life sciences, manufacturing, media and entertainment, semiconductor, and technology industries. GlobalLogic is a Hitachi Group Company operating under Hitachi, Ltd. (TSE: 6501) which contributes to a sustainable society with a higher quality of life by driving innovation through data and technology as the Social Innovation Business.
